bitfield.description: Module ID
RTL version
Major version
Custom version
Minor version
Status to indicate if read on serial VBUS is complete, write of any value will clear this bit. Writing 1 to any bit will clear the corresponding bits. Reads do not alter the value of the field.
Read address
Write 1 to trigger a read on the serial VBUS. Writing 1 to any bit will set the corresponding bit. Reads do not alter the value of the field.
Value written to select the corresponding ECC RAM for control or status
Indicates the number of RAMS serviced by the ECC aggregator
TI Internal : Reserved
TI Internal : Check timeout
TI Internal : Check Parity
TI Internal : Force Error only once
TI Internal : Force Error on any RAM read
TI Internal : Force Double Bit Error
TI Internal : Force Single Bit Error
TI Internal : Enable rmw
TI Internal : Enable ECC check
TI Internal : Enable ECC
TI Internal : Row address where single or double-bit error needs to be applied. This is ignored if force_n_row is set
TI Internal : Data bit that needs to be flipped if double bit error needs to be forced
TI Internal : Data bit that needs to be flipped when force_sec is set
TI Internal : Data bit that corresponds to the single-bit error
TI Internal : Clear Ctrl Reg Error Status. Write 1 to clear. This bit is self clearing.
TI Internal : Clear Parity Error Status. Write 1 to clear. This bit is self clearing.
TI Internal : Clear Other Error Status. Write 1 to clear. This bit is self clearing.
TI Internal : Clear Double Bit Error Status. Write 1 to clear. This bit is self clearing.
TI Internal : Clear Single Bit Error Status. Write 1 to clear. This bit is self clearing.
TI Internal : Force ctrl reg pending interrupt. Write 1 to set. This bit is self clearing.
TI Internal : Force ECC parity pending interrupt. Write 1 to set. This bit is self clearing.
TI Internal : Force ECC other pending interrupt. Write 1 to set. This bit is self clearing.
TI Internal : Force ECC DED pending interrupt. Write 1 to set. This bit is self clearing.
TI Internal : Force ECC SEC pending interrupt. Write 1 to set. This bit is self clearing.
TI Internal : Row address where the single or double-bit error has occurred
TI Internal : Reserved
TI Internal : Clear timeout pending
TI Internal : Reserved
TI Internal : Timeout pending
TI Internal : Reserved
EOI Register. Writing 1 to any bit will set the corresponding bit. Reads do not alter the value of the field. This bit is self clearing, reading this bit will return 0.
Interrupt Pending Status for ctrl_edc_vbuss_pend.
Interrupt Pending Status for msgmem_pend.
Interrupt Enable Set Register for ctrl_edc_vbuss_pend. Writing 1 to any bit will set the corresponding bit. Reads do not alter the value of the field.
Interrupt Enable Set Register for msgmem_pend. Writing 1 to any bit will set the corresponding bit. Reads do not alter the value of the field.
Interrupt Enable Clear Register for ctrl_edc_vbuss_pend. Writing 1 to any bit will clear the corresponding bits. Reads do not alter the value of the field. Reading this bit will return 0.
Interrupt Enable Clear Register for msgmem_pend. Writing 1 to any bit will clear the corresponding bits. Reads do not alter the value of the field. Reading this bit will return 0.
EOI Register. Writing 1 to any bit will set the corresponding bit. Reads do not alter the value of the field. This bit is self clearing, reading this bit will return 0.
Interrupt Pending Status for ctrl_edc_vbuss_pend.
Interrupt Pending Status for msgmem_pend.
Interrupt Enable Set Register for ctrl_edc_vbuss_pend. Writing 1 to any bit will set the corresponding bit. Reads do not alter the value of the field.
Interrupt Enable Set Register for msgmem_pend. Writing 1 to any bit will set the corresponding bit. Reads do not alter the value of the field.
Interrupt Enable Clear Register for ctrl_edc_vbuss_pend. Writing 1 to any bit will clear the corresponding bits. Reads do not alter the value of the field. Reading this bit will return 0.
Interrupt Enable Clear Register for msgmem_pend. Writing 1 to any bit will clear the corresponding bits. Reads do not alter the value of the field. Reading this bit will return 0.
Interrupt Enable Set Register for svbus timeout errors. Writing 1 to any bit will set the corresponding bit. Reads do not alter the value of the field.
Interrupt Enable Set Register for parity errors. Writing 1 to any bit will set the corresponding bit. Reads do not alter the value of the field.
Interrupt Enable Clear for svbus timeout errors. Writing 1 to any bit will clear the corresponding bits. Reads do not alter the value of the field. Reading this bit will return 0.
Interrupt Enable Clear for parity errors. Writing 1 to any bit will clear the corresponding bits. Reads do not alter the value of the field. Reading this bit will return 0.
Interrupt status set for svbus timeout errors. A write to increment field. Writing a value to this field increment the field value by the value written. Reads do not alter the value of the field.
Interrupt status set for parity errors. A write to increment field. Writing a value to this field increment the field value by the value written. Reads do not alter the value of the field.
Interrupt status clear for svbus timeout errors. A write to decrement field. Writing a value to this field decrements the field value by the value written. Reads do not alter the value of the field.
Interrupt status clear for parity errors. A write to decrement field. Writing a value to this field decrements the field value by the value written. Reads do not alter the value of the field.
